name: I Love Finding Cats
description:
I Love Finding Cats is a classic Hidden Object game with a great selection of mini-games. Visit beautiful locations from across the globe while you find and collect adorable feline friends!



Search for cats through lavishly illustrated and animated backgrounds. Discover a wide range of hidden object scenarios, as well as various puzzles and, most importantly, collect all the beautiful cats!



This edition includes 6 extra locations, 12 extra minigames, wallpapers, and music player. Discover and adopt all 20 cats!
